column1: Funeral services will be held Tuesday
column3: 2015 at 11:00 a.m. at Immaculate Heart of Mary Catholic Church  Services will be conducted by Fr. Chester Arceneaux.  Visitation will be held Tuesday
column5: 2015 at Immaculate Heart of Mary Catholic Church at 8:00 a.m. until time of service. A rosary will be recited at 9:00 a.m.
